mainEntity.name: What type of services do the hostels in Kolkata provide ?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Most of the basic amenities are available like:
  • a) AC
  • b) Wi-Fi
  • c) Washing Machine
  • d) Television

mainEntity.name: Which areas have the most number of PG Hostels in Kolkata ?

acceptedAnswer.text:
These areas have the most number of PG Hostels:
  • a) South Dumdum
  • b) Bara Kanthalia
  • c) Baranagar
  • d) Salt Lake City
  • e) Park Street Area

mainEntity.name: What is the approximate cost of living in PG hostels in Kolkata ?

acceptedAnswer.text: It depends and varies based on the locality, amenities, etc., but the usual price of a shared room starts with Rs.5000 per month.

mainEntity.name: What is the age limit for signing up at a hostel in Kolkata ?

acceptedAnswer.text: Minimum age requirement is 18 years. Proper documents are also required to available a room.

mainEntity.name: Does PGO Charge any extra charges apart from rates mentioned in properties?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, On the contrary you can save 10% on each booking made through PGO app. T&C apply.
